scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist/scripts && cp src/*.{php,txt} dist/ && cp src/scripts/*.php dist/scripts
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/scripts.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/scripts.min.js
scripts.build:js: npm run jshint && npm run uglify
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
